name: lengthy-svg
description: Microlibrary to give an SVG path's length in a CSS var.

scripts.build: rollup src/lengthy-svg.js --output.format umd --name 'Lengthy' --output.file lengthy-svg.js && uglifyjs -c -m -o lengthy-svg.min.js -- lengthy-svg.js && npm run sizes
scripts.sizes: gzip -9 -c lengthy-svg.min.js | wc -c && cat lengthy-svg.min.js | wc -c

author: Stephen Shaw (stephen@brokensquare.com)
